column1: The Purple Pig////Service was okay- dishes came out quickly
column2: and front of house was very sweet. Our waiter was a bit mercurial
column3: fluctuating between helpful kindness and mildly pretentious standoffishness
column4: which threw us for a loop a few times when trying to order. However
column5: our experience at The Purple Pig as a whole was greatly positive- pricing was very fair all things considered and the food was creative and thoughtful. I was slightly underwhelmed (expectations perhaps being inflated due to the many positive reviews)
column6: but I would love to return sometime to try their other dishes.
